p: The representative chromatograms of mobile phase, placebo, pure MeJA and MeJA in MeJA-MRC are presented in Fig. 4. The solution of MeJA-MRC showed a distinct, well-resolved and symmetric peak at the retention time of 4.5 min ( Fig. 4d). It is worthwhile to note that interfering peaks of placebo matrix were absent at the retention time of MeJA, indicating the specificity of the proposed method.
